00001 /*
00002   This file dialog is taken from the official Irrlicht forum as Irrlicht itself doesn't feature a "save file" dialog.
00003   The URL of the thread is http://irrlicht.sourceforge.net/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=30241. Thanks to JP for providing
00004   this nice piece of code.
00005 */

00020           EFST_OPEN_DIALOG, //<! For opening files
00021           EFST_SAVE_DIALOG, //<! For saving files
00022           EFST_NUM_TYPES    //<! Not used, just specifies how many possible types there are
00023         };

00062       inline core::stringw getFileFilter() const {
00063                if (FilterComboBox->getSelected() >= (s32)FileFilters.size()) return core::stringw("All Files");
00064                else return FileFilters[FilterComboBox->getSelected()].FileExtension;
00065         }
00066 
00071         inline E_FILESELECTOR_TYPE getDialogType() { return DialogType; }
00072 
00079         void addFileFilter(wchar_t* name, wchar_t* ext, video::ITexture* texture);
00080 
00085         inline void setCustomFileIcon(video::ITexture* texture) {
00086           if (texture) FileIconIdx = addIcon(texture);
00087           else FileIconIdx = -1;
00088           fillListBox();
00089         }
00094         inline void setCustomDirectoryIcon(video::ITexture* texture) {
00095           if (texture) DirectoryIconIdx = addIcon(texture);
00096           else DirectoryIconIdx = -1;
00097           fillListBox();
00098         }
00099 
00104         inline void setDirectoryChoosable(bool choosable) { IsDirectoryChoosable = choosable; }
00105 
00106         virtual const io::path &        getDirectoryName() { m_sPath=""; return m_sPath; }
00107    protected:
00108         io::path m_sPath;

00142         struct SFileFilter {
00143           /*
00144           \brief Constructor
00145           \param name - The name/description of the filter
00146           \param filter - The file extension required
00147           \param texture - The texture to use as an icon for the file type
00148           */
00149           SFileFilter(wchar_t* name, wchar_t* filter, video::ITexture* texture) {
00150             FilterName = name;
00151             FileExtension = filter;
00152             FileIcon = texture;
00153             FileIconIdx = 0;
00154           }
00155           void operator=(const SFileFilter& other) {
00156             FilterName = other.FilterName;
00157             FileExtension = other.FileExtension;
00158             FileIcon = other.FileIcon;
00159             FileIconIdx = other.FileIconIdx;
00160           }
00161           core::stringw FilterName;
00162           core::stringw FileExtension;
00163           video::ITexture* FileIcon;
00164           u32 FileIconIdx;
00165         };
